trans-unit.source: Allows the transformation of a set of [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] types that are used in data contracts into an XML schema file (.xsd).
trans-unit.target: Permite que a transformação de um conjunto de [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tipos que são usados em contratos de dados em um arquivo de esquema XML (. xsd).

trans-unit.source: Use the XsdDataContractExporter class when you have created a Web service that incorporates data represented by common language runtime (CLR) types and when you need to export XML schemas for each type to be consumed by other Web services.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe XsdDataContractExporter quando você criou um serviço Web que incorpora os dados representados por tipos common language runtime (CLR) e quando você precisa exportar esquemas XML para cada tipo a ser consumida por outros serviços da Web.

trans-unit.source: That is, XsdDataContractExporter transforms a set of CLR types into XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, XsdDataContractExporter transforma um conjunto de tipos CLR em esquemas XML.

trans-unit.source: (For more information about the types that can be used, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).) The schemas can then be exposed through a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document for use by others who need to interoperate with your service.
trans-unit.target: (Para obter mais informações sobre os tipos que podem ser usados, consulte [tipos suportados pelo serializador de contrato de dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).) Os esquemas, em seguida, podem ser expostos por meio de um documento WSDL Web Services Description Language () para uso por outras pessoas que precisam interagir com seu serviço.

trans-unit.source: Conversely, if you are creating a Web service that must interoperate with an existing Web service, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to transform XML schemas and create the CLR types that represent the data in a selected programming language.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, se você estiver criando um serviço Web que deve interoperar com um serviço da Web existente, use o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>para transformar os esquemas XML e criar os tipos CLR que representam os dados em uma linguagem de programação selecionada.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>

trans-unit.source: The XsdDataContractExporter generates an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object that contains the collection of schemas.
trans-unit.target: O XsdDataContractExporter gera um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>objeto que contém a coleção de esquemas.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: Access the set of schemas through the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Acessar o conjunto de esquemas por meio de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To quickly generate XML schema definition (XSD) files that other Web services can consume, use the XsdDataContractExporter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para gerar rapidamente arquivos XSD (definição) do esquema XML que podem consumir outros serviços da Web, use o XsdDataContractExporter.

trans-unit.source: Exporting Schemas Into an XmlSchemaSet To create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class that contains XML schema files, you should be aware of the following.
trans-unit.target: Exportando esquemas em um XmlSchemaSet para criar uma instância do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>classe que contém os arquivos de esquema XML, você deve estar ciente do seguinte.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: The set of types you are exporting are recorded as an internal set of data contracts.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de tipos que você está exportando são registradas como um conjunto interno de contratos de dados.

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> method multiple times to add new types to the schema set without degrading performance because only the new types will be added to the set.
trans-unit.target: Assim, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>método várias vezes para adicionar novos tipos para o esquema definido sem afetar o desempenho porque apenas os novos tipos serão adicionados ao conjunto.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> operation, the existing schemas are compared to the new schemas being added.
trans-unit.target: Durante o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A>operação, os esquemas existentes são comparados com os novos esquemas que está sendo adicionados.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are conflicts, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se houver conflitos, uma exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: A conflict is usually detected if two types with the same data contract name but different contracts (different members) are exported by the same XsdDataContractExporter instance.
trans-unit.target: Um conflito é detectado geralmente se dois tipos com os mesmos dados de contrato de nome, mas diferentes contratos (membros diferentes) são exportados pela mesma instância XsdDataContractExporter.

trans-unit.source: Using the Exporter A recommended way of using this class is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Recomendável usar o exportador A maneira de usar essa classe é o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported.
trans-unit.target: Use um do <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>sobrecargas para determinar se o tipo especificado ou o conjunto de tipos pode ser exportado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use one of the overloads that is appropriate to your requirements.
trans-unit.target: Use uma das sobrecargas que seja apropriada para suas necessidades.

trans-unit.source: Call the corresponding <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar correspondente <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the schemas from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A>property.
trans-unit.target: Recuperar os esquemas do <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref> class with the specified set of schemas.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref> classe com o conjunto especificado de esquemas.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when you have an existing <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to which you want to add new schemas.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga quando você tiver uma <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>à qual você deseja adicionar novos esquemas.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: After you construct a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> with this overload, call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method to add new types to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: Depois de construir um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>com essa sobrecarga, chame o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A>método para adicionar novos tipos para o conjunto existente.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> that contains the schemas to be exported.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> que contém os esquemas a serem exportados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the set of .common language runtime (CLR) types contained in a set of assemblies can be exported.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o conjunto de tipos de .common language runtime (CLR) contidos em um conjunto de módulos (assemblies) pode ser exportado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that contains the assemblies with the types to export.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> de <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>que contém os assemblies com os tipos de exportar.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the types can be exported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os tipos podem ser exportados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the set of .common language runtime (CLR) types contained in a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> can be exported.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o conjunto de tipos do .common language runtime (CLR) contidos em um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> podem ser exportados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that contains the specified types to export.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> que contém os tipos especificados para exportar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the types can be exported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os tipos podem ser exportados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified common language runtime (CLR) type can be exported.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o tipo common language runtime (CLR) especificado pode ser exportado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to export.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para exportar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type can be exported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o tipo pode ser exportado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the types contained in the specified collection of assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Transforma os tipos contidos na coleção especificada de assemblies.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> (of <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>) that contains the types to export.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> (de <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>) que contém os tipos para exportação.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: The assemblies argument is .
trans-unit.target: The assemblies argument is .

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> in the collection is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>na coleção é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: Transforms the types contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: Transforma os tipos contidos no <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> passado para este método.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> (of <xref:System.Type>) that contains the types to export.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> (de <xref:System.Type>) que contém os tipos para exportação.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The types argument is .
trans-unit.target: The types argument is .

trans-unit.source: A type in the collection is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo na coleção é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type into an XML schema definition language (XSD) schema.
trans-unit.target: Transforma especificado [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tipo em um esquema de linguagem XSD de definição de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> to determine whether the type can be exported.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>para determinar se o tipo pode ser exportado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling the Export method, the schema can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o método de exportação, o esquema pode ser recuperado por meio de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to transform into an XML schema.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>transformar em um esquema XML.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type argument is .
trans-unit.target: The type argument is .

trans-unit.source: Returns the top-level name and namespace for the <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nome de nível superior e o namespace para <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to query.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>à consulta.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that represents the top-level name and namespace for this <xref:System.Type>, which is written to the stream when writing this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>que representa o nome de nível superior e o namespace para este <xref:System.Type>, que é gravado no fluxo durante a gravação desse objeto.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The type argument is .
trans-unit.target: The type argument is .

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML schema type for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo de esquema XML para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of this method is to allow anonymous types in XML schema to be represented.
trans-unit.target: O principal objetivo desse método é permitir tipos anônimos no esquema XML para ser representado.

trans-unit.source: Because anonymous types do not have a contract name and namespace, they cannot be looked up using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Como tipos anônimos não tem um nome de contrato e um namespace, eles não podem ser pesquisados usando <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> definition for such types.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>definição para esses tipos.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>

trans-unit.source: The types for which the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A> method returns a valid name, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos para os quais o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>método retorna um nome válido, esse método retorna `null`.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type to return a schema for.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para retornar um esquema.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> that contains the XML schema.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> que contém o esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The type argument is .
trans-unit.target: The type argument is .

trans-unit.source: Returns the contract name and contract namespace for the <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o namespace de contrato nome e contrato para <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that was exported.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>que foi exportado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that represents the contract name of the type and its namespace.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>que representa o nome do contrato do tipo e seu namespace.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The type argument is .
trans-unit.target: The type argument is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> that contains options that can be set for the export operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"> </xref> que contém opções que podem ser definidas para a operação de exportação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> that contains options used to customize how types are exported to schemas.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"> </xref> que contém as opções usadas para personalizar como os tipos são exportados para esquemas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of exported XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de esquemas do XML exportados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> that contains the schemas transformed from the set of common language runtime (CLR) types after calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export*> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> que contém os esquemas transformados do conjunto de tipos common language runtime (CLR) depois de chamar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export*>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export*>
